# Identify pain points

As your team works, you'll identify common roadblocks in your analysis projects. Figure out what those problems are, then build tools to minimize or eliminate those problems.

## Has anyone already solved this problem?

Stack Overflow and Google can solve many of your problems - start there!

## Develop internal solutions

Create functions that your team can use. Look at Advanced R book for more on funcitonal programming. 

Bundle common tools and/or data into an R package. Look at R packages book for more info.
